name: Tether USD
description: This token has been created specifically for hands-on blockchain security education and practical training in real-world environments. True and effective learning in the field of cybersecurity cannot be achieved without experiencing real conditions and controlled risks. Therefore, this token provides a safe and realistic laboratory platform for students and researchers to understand vulnerabilities, simulate attacks, and evaluate defense mechanisms within the TRON (TRC-20) ecosystem. The ultimate goal is to foster knowledge, enhance practical skills, and advance security awareness without any financial risk or real-world consequences. ⚠️ This is NOT the official Tether USD and has no monetary value.
